item.title: Making an API with Datasette and Glitch
item.description: Please note that this course website is equipped with the Hypothes.is annotation layer. If a step is not clear, or there is missing information, or you get stuck, please highlight the relevant text and leave an annotation in our class Hypothesis group to alert me. Our end goal - or one of our end goals - is to get the material out of the museum, out of the printed page, and online where someone can query it, filter it, extract items of interest, mash it together with other data, or something else entirely that we haven’t thought of yet.
